LanguageData.Boompede.label: boompede
LanguageData.Boompede.description: A medium-sized bioengineered bug the size of a sheep. The Boomopede is the middle caste of a hive, taking care of most work tasks as well as fighting with its claws.
LanguageData.Boompede.tools.head_claw.label: head claw
LanguageData.Boompede.tools.head.label: head
